.. _setting_up_hardware:

Setting up hardware
###################

Before setting up KNX Point API environment,  you need to make sure you have correctly set up the required hardware.

Development Kit
***************

Two nRF52840 DKs are required to run the KNX IoT demo application. For information on how to start working with the devices, refer to `Getting started with nRF52 Series`_ page.

.. _sniffer_configuration:

nRF Sniffer for 802.15.4
************************

For information on how to start working with the `Nordic nRF52840-Dongle`_ as sniffer, refer to `nRF Sniffer for 802.15.4`_ page.
